CustomField.description: （客製項目用欄位）approval process 控制欄位
CustomField.formula: ( IF( ISPICKVAL( Distribute_Country__c , 'TW') , true, false) && ( IF(ISPICKVAL(Lead_Distrib_Logic__c, 'ToQueue') && Roll_up_summary_All_Staging_Lead_Count__c = Roll_up_summary_ToQueue__c , true, false) || IF(ISPICKVAL(Lead_Distrib_Logic__c, 'ToPerson') && Roll_up_summary_All_Staging_Lead_Count__c = Roll_up_summary_ToPerson__c , true, false) ) ) && Roll_up_summary_All_Staging_Lead_Count__c > 0
CustomField.label: Approval process開關
